name: I Belli Capelli Ravenna Repair B-tox Hair Treatment -Cirugia Capilar Para El Cabello, Formaldehyde-Free, Long Lasting, Anti-Frizz, Smoothing, 35.2 oz (1kg)
short_description: LONG LASTING STRAIGHTNESS: Get sleek, frizz-free hair that lasts. Our keratin treatment penetrates deep into hair fibers, transforming them into silky-straight strands with lasting smoothness.

BRAZILIAN KERATIN POWER: Infused with authentic Brazilian keratin, our hair mask delivers intense hydration and nourishment. It works from root to tip, leaving hair stronger, smoother, and visibly healthier.
STRENGTH AND HYDRATION – Enriched with collagen, panthenol, shea butter, argan oil, and glycerin, this treatment boosts elasticity, reduces breakage, and restores softness for silky, manageable hair.
SUITABLE FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: Ideal for thick, dry, damaged, and frizzy hair. Achieve visibly stronger, healthier, and glossy hair from the very first application.

EASY APPLICATION FOR SALON-RESULTS: 1. Wash your hair with the deep cleansing shampoo. Do not use any conditioner or mask. 2. Dry your hair at least 80% before applying the product. 3. Apply the product to the entire length of the hair, leaving a gap of one finger width from the roots. 4. Leave it on for 30 to 60 minutes. 5. If you feel the hair has too much product, lift it slightly, blow dry your hair until it is 100% dry. 6. Finish by flat ironing each strand 15 to 20 times.
